bitfield.description: Revision number
Number of attached SDRAM controllers
Number of DMM sections
Number of attached SDRAM controllers
Number of DMM sections
Configuration of the local target state management mode.

bitenum.description: Force-idle mode: local target's idle state follows (acknowledges) the system's idle requests unconditionally, that is, regardless of the IP module's internal requirements. Backup mode, for debug only.
No-idle mode: local target never enters idle state. Backup mode, for debug only.

Smart-idle mode: local target's idle state eventually follows (acknowledges) the system's idle requests, depending on the IP module's internal requirements. IP module shall not generate (IRQ- or DMA-request-related) wake-up events.

bitfield.description: Should be written as 0
DMM lock map
Weight for the LISA arbitration when any bit of the vector Mflag[63:0] is set.The recommendation is to set this field to 0x8 with ENABLE =1, after reset. .
0: Emergency feature is disabled.The recommendation is to enable the feature (=1) after reset. enum=UNLOCKED .

bitenum.description: Enable the emergency feature. LISA arbitration priority is higher for the initiator that set Mflag input of this initiator.

bitfield.description: DMM system section address MSB for view mapping i
DMM system section size for view mapping i

register.description: Per-event raw interrupt status vector. Raw status is set even if the related event is not enabled. Write 1 to set the (raw) status, mostly for debug. n = 0 for the first interrupt status raw register, n = 1 for the second interrupt status raw register.

register.description: Per-event 'enabled' interrupt status vector. Enabled status is not set unless the event is enabled. Write 1 to clear the status after interrupt has been serviced (raw status gets cleared, that is, even if not enabled). n = 0 for the first interrupt status register, n = 1 for the second interrupt status register.

register.description: Status register for each refill engine n = 0 for the first engine status register, n = 1 for the second engine status register.

register.description: Physical address of the next table refill descriptor n = 0 for the descriptor register of the first engine, n = 1 for the descriptor register of the second engine. Writing to this register aborts the current ongoing area reload and resets the corresponding, and registers.

bitfield.description: Physical address of the next table refill descriptor of engine n

register.description: Physical address of the next table refill descriptor n = 0 for the descriptor register of the first engine, n = 1 for the descriptor register of the second engine. Writing to this register aborts the current ongoing area reload and resets the corresponding, and registers.

register.description: Physical address of the next table refill descriptor n = 0 for the descriptor register of the first engine, n = 1 for the descriptor register of the second engine. Writing to this register aborts the current ongoing area reload and resets the corresponding, and registers.
